## General Guidelines

## Testing Guidelines
- Use xUnit for testing frameworks.
- Implement SQLite as a file-based database for parallel isolation.
- Utilize Autofac for dependency injection in tests.
- Ensure explicit assembly registration in xUnit tests to discover components.

## Project-Specific Rules
- Create a test project to evaluate asynchronous execution in LiteOrm.
- Build a robust testing suite for CRUD operations and Transactions.
